Title: Makes all state lands subject to taxation for all purposes; repealer
Summary: Makes all state lands subject to taxation for all purposes.
LawCode: Amd ยง532, rpld ยง536, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to making all state lands subject to taxation for all purposes; and to repeal section 536 of the real property tax law relating to certain state lands subject to taxation for school purposes only
